result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:45 AM Defendant John J. Thoms in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Brian F. Bennett in court for John J. Thoms.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Going to track along with 22CM191 and 22CF147 for scheduling purposes. Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Per Local Court Rule, this case is being transferred to Branch 2 to track with 22CF128 and 22CF147 so that currently open cases are heard by the same court official.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on September 29, 2022 at 11:30 am.

9:08 AM Defendant John J. Thoms in court without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls both cases. Defendant speaks about retaining an attorney. PD's Office is also seeking counsel. Defendant received both criminal complaints in court. Bond continued.
Status hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 10:45 am.

9:29 AM Defendant John J. Thoms appeared by video without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Bond continued
Status hearing scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:17 AM Defendant John J. Thoms appeared by video, without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Public defender has made 967 contacts to secure counsel without success.  Bond continued.
Status hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Status hearing on July 25, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 967 Contacts

9:39 AM Defendant John J. Thoms appeared by video without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receiving copy of complaint.  Public defender continues to make efforts on appointing counsel.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Defendant appears in court in custody without counsel. DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is public defender eligible and they are making attempts to seek counsel. Court adjourns initial appearance to May 9th at 9:30 am. bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 09:15 am.

9:39 AM Defendant John J. Thoms appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Karl Peter Hayes for State of Wisconsin appeared in court.  Defendant states he has not received complaint.  Attempt was made by the State to serve complaint and it was returned.  Complaint will be emailed to the jail for service on defendant.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 09:45 am.

1:26 PM  Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  DA Karl Hayes appears for the State of Wisconsin.  No complaint filed yet.  DA Hayes speaks to the incident that occurred that resulted in the defendant's arrest. Court finds probable cause.  Bond set at $2,500 Signature with conditions: Maintain absolute sobriety, No possession of medications without a prescription.
Hearing scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 09:45 am.
